#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define gi(x) scanf("%d",&x) 
#define gll(x) scanf("%lld",&x)
#define pb push_back
#define mp make_pair
#define all(p) p.begin(),p.end()
typedef long long ll;
int main(){
	ll n,x;
	gll(n);
	ll a[1000000+1];
	memset(a,0ll,sizeof(a));
	for(int i=1;i<=n;i++){
		gll(x);
		a[x]++;
	}
	ll ans=0;
	for(int i=1;i<=1000000;i++){
		if(a[i]>1){
			ans+=((a[i])*(a[i]-1))/2;
		}
	}
	printf("%lld\n",((n*(n-1))/2)-ans);
	return 0;
}
